评论概述: nice zero degree shoes but be careful you do hurt yourself
评论详情: Very well made shoes.  I wore them for three months and now I totally regret buying zero degree shoes.  Maybe you will find out for yourself what it really does to your body.  i regret wearing zero degree shoes.  However, these shoes are well made and comfortable.

I liked the look of these shoes. They looked really good, had great grip and where comfortable to wear, i got compliments in them..... I really wanted to like these, but they did not let your feet breath at all. You'd think they would from their look and the fabric, but my feat would be sweaty and wet anytime i wore these longer than an hour or two. My feet would smell awful and so would the shoe. I would take them off and leave wet spots on the floor as i walked. Didnt mater what socks id wear whool, cotton, didnt matter. And when i didnt wear socks it was actually worse. These are not barefoot shoes. The back of the shoe gave me a blister everytime id try, and again my feet would be wet and smelly.  They also got extremely dirty very quickly i would wash them with bleach regularly..... i tossed them after spending an 8 hour day in them, my wife and i went on a day trip and i could smell my feet walking in the stores. I bought new shoes and threw them out. Dont waste your money.

评论概述: Comfort & ability to train at home
评论详情: Def comfort and feel as good or better than being bare foot due to the impact on our foot sole. A great bargain for a well-made favorite hike and water fun slip-on shoe

I’ve had my pair for over two years and with very regular wear, they have held up so well! I’m very impressed especially for the price point. These are my favorite lifting shoes because I can feel the ground and there is no lift in the heel. They are not padded so walking or running in them is not the best but I do jump rope in them. I like how the sole wraps up the edges a bit and even has rubber where laces tie. I find this handy when doing band or cable work so that things don’t slip off. I also really like the style and look of them. Black is super functional but now I want to add other colors! I’m more of a true 9 so sometimes there’s a bit more looseness than I’d like but I wear thin socks too. I could cinch them down more with the laces though.  My favorite part is that I can leave them tied and slip them on and off. They also don’t take up much space in my workout bag.
These shoes have arches, unlike a similar looking pair, and caused my plantar faciitis to return.  I have stopped wearing them!
The shoes are true to fit and very comfortable.

I love them they are super comfy and they feel great quality for an affordable price. They fit me perfectly, I’m 7 USA or 24.5 cm and bought 38.
Very comfortable, roomy for toes to spread and the soles have good grip!
I love these shoes! Busy mom of three (6,4,3yearold) & always on my feet. Perfect for the gym and running errands. I get lots of compliments. I got the black with tan bottoms.
I've actually had a pair of these for almost a year and they're my most favorite. This shoe could not be more comfortable and well made. I have to say I love these shoes!

评论概述: THE BEST pair of shoes you will own — Changed my life and foot health forever!
评论详情: I have had these shoes for over a year, and I have worn them to death (as you can tell in the pictures lol!). They have traveled with me across Europe, through work, classes, and everything in-between. I struggled with plantar fasciitis because of exercise & improper sneakers (the cushion-ier, the worse-r lol). After doing a lot of research on barefoot shoes and foot health, I decided to give these a shot. I now have two pairs and wear them every single day — No more foot pain, my feet are so much stronger, and weightlifting at the gym has never been better. Seriously invest in these shoes, they’re the best price for the best value! My partner loves them and wears them every day too! Seriously recommend.

评论概述: The most comfortable shoes I have ever worn!
评论详情: Finally a pair of shoes that fit my wide feet! I was having to buy shoes that were a size or two too big because my feet are so wide but I can wear my true size in these. They are so comfortable!

First pair of these that I ordered fit like a glove. By far the most comfortable and non-restrictive pair of running shoes I've ever owned. Loads of wiggle room for the toes, fit nicely adjustable across the arch. Elegant enough for dress-casual wear. And so I immediately ordered a second pair.  The second pair -- identical color, style, and nominal/labeled size -- were way too small. So, if you are on the edge of a size, DEFINITELY go one size up.

I was looking for a sneaker that wasn't bulky and heavy. I have a wide toe box and the largest size 10/11 is perfect. Standard woman size 11.  I prefer a minimalist shoe, often barefoot most of the spring -fall months. These are very lightweight and so comfortable sometimes I forget I have them on.  I slip them on when I'm out doing errands. I'm not sure I'd go running long distances in them, but they are comfortable.Cons: Slippery on wet painted surfaces.  The elastic around the base of the ankle may annoy some
I absolutely love these zero drop shoes. My feet love them even more.

评论概述: NOT barefoot shoes or like any other whiten shoes
评论详情: I’ve loved whitin shoes and own three pairs. I liked the texture on the bottom of these so I tried them out. They are terrible! They are narrow, no wide toe box, super thick base that makes them not foldable as they should be if they were “barefoot” shoes. Incredibly disappointed.
Fells like walking on air

My husband purchased two pairs of these shoes to suprise both myself and my daughter knowing that we were getting ready to purchase a gym membership. Unfortunately, memberships was delayed due to unexpected surgery. We've worn these shoes this week in the gym (they weren't worn outside) and both are experiencing severe foot pain. They are tight in the wrong places. Sadly, we are just outside the 30-day refund for her shoes and a week or two beyond mine. Would not recommend these shoes!!

TLDR: I recommend this brand for everyday use!  Using their size guide we actually got shoes that fit the first time around! If you’ve ever bought shoes online before, especially for kids AND considering European sizes, that’s a small miracle.  We mostly wear them barefoot (without socks), I had a small period of adjusting my outside toe to that as expected (photographed) but now I can with ease, and if I choose a low sock the fit/wear is just as pleasant, no sliding down on the back of heel, there’s actually small cushions on the inside of the shoe I tried to picture. They’re so comfortable. I never tie or untie these, I slide on and off each wear, the sock fit is a very nice feature for me here. I included photos comparing to crocs, vivos, and hey dudes but those all have pretty wide toe boxes.  My girls, ages 5&2 loved them from the get—sparkly and beautiful, and not in a ‘in your face pink glitter for a girl’ color, they can go with or without socks (never experiencing a blister) AND they can take them on and off without help. Which holds a lot of weight for most moms.  Speaking of weight, they’re very light. They don’t feel blocky or sound like my kids are having a hard time wearing them, even with the wider toe box which is my favorite part and is likely why the fit is so comfortable for all of us. Most US made adult tennis shoes have tight toe boxes where these do not, without compromising look/style. I love the tannish beige, I accepted they wouldn’t stay ‘clean’ forever but I don’t regret my choice. They match with everything and I can wear them with every kind of bottom except skinny jeans as I just personally don’t like the look of tight jeans with a tennis shoe but I’ll wear leggings, sweats, joggers and shorts with them.  Lastly, Kids’ tend to show the quality of a shoe/brand pretty quickly. These have held up well as being our main shoe since summer 2024—parks, outside play, coaching volleyball and still nice enough for church. Current (Dec 2024) photos showing wear included.
I like the overall appearance, the cushioning is good , the space for rows are great, but it hurt the back of my heals and I cannot close the strap because is too tight on my high arches

I really like these shoes as this is my fourth pair. For me they last about 18 -20 months wearing them almost every day walking on paved roads and nature trails. I bought my first pair after I had plantar fasciitis about 5 years ago and I’m happy to say it has not returned since. They are light, airy and I haven’t had any issues with their functionality. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for zero drop shoes, especially for the price.
So comfortable! Large toe box completely resolved foot pain. Affordable . I bought three pairs different colors.  Buy them!😉
I do like these shoes I had to go up a size
These shoes are difficult to get into!!! The flap is awkwardly sewn down. I’m returning them
Too short - I usually wear 8W.  These were a size 38 (European).  My toes went all the way to the end.  They may run smaller?  Order a size bigger.  Look well made.

评论概述: Not all colors fit the same
评论详情: I love, love the barefoot shoes. Last spring I ordered the green pair from this brand and they were perfect. I wore them so much that I wore them out (wore a hole in the toe area). I just bought this brand's grey with pink trim to replace the green ones and found the grey ones are much narrower than the green ones so they do not fit my feet as well. I still like them, but just not as much as the green ones. Therefore - if you have narrower feet, go for the grey ones. If you have wider feet, go for the green ones (I can't speak to the other colors).

I have bought expensive sneakers and they all hurt my feet. I have supination and sneakers with a thick sole hurt the outside of my feet. I also have high arches and always need insoles. These are the best sneakers I’ve owned! It feels like walking barefoot. No more pain!
Maybe it's 'cause I'm not a trail runner, but these were not for me. Maybe just too different. Maybe just flat out not good. I don't know.

评论概述: Like wearing gloves on my feet!

These shoes were excellent for traction in the woods. Purchased them in 2/2024. By August the soles were separating from the fabric portion of shoe. Can't be repaired. Trash

I bought these mostly because I needed the specific color. They look very nice in person. I really like that they don’t make my feet look super wide like a lot of this style of shoe can do. They are comfortable but be aware they don’t have lots of cushion or support like regular athletic shoes. AI’m not young, and after two long days on my feet, I would have preferred an insole of some sort, but they really weren’t terrible. Additionally, I surprised how many compliments I received. They are a nice looking shoe. I’d recommend them and would buy them again.

评论详情: I really wanted these shoes to work, but strap at the top is velcro and did not overlap enough so it could stay shut. I have high arches, however I suspect that even if you have normal feet you may find this a problem. Other than that they seemed comfortable.
Strong wear and go shoe I love it alot

…which makes walking super fun at times. So typically my casual corporate attire consists of dress pants with tennis shoes, but recently I was called to jury duty. I didn’t feel tennis shoes would be appropriate so I searched for something more low key. While they failed to cure my MS, the super light weight, wide toe area, easy on/off & sleek design of these shoes did make walking a little easier & made this girl feel a little more stylish then what is typically offered for people in my position.

I order a TON of items off of Amazon and never write reviews. These are great. I love them for working out and have worn them out with athlesure outfits and received several compliments. Ordering a second pair so I have one for workouts and one for fashion.
The soles bunch up when trying to remove the shoes from your feet which is really frustrating because you have to straighten them again which is not easy to do with these particular shoes.

I'm already a big fan of hike barefoot shoes. My first pair of shoes that don't get my feet wet like the barefoot shoes. My feet don't ache and it's the only brand I wear now. I'm a Medical Assistant and am on my feet for long hours at work and at home. They are different from the barefoot shoes due to the weight. These are a little heavier but ok for me. I like how easy it is t9 put on and take off, as well tighten to the tightness you are comfortable with. Will definitely be ordering more of these. Waiting on the boots to arrive now. Truly love at first step in this style of barefoot shoes.

评论概述: Everything I wanted in a shoe
评论详情: I have tried almost all brands of shoes. I have low back degeneration. My legs and feet hurt constantly and i have atrophy in my calfs which limits foot flex and grab.  These shoes are perfect, they allow me to grip without using toes and gives my step more power.  As thin as they are, I don't feel pebbles when on gravelly surfaces.  Love these so much I wear them instead of my slippers!
This is a very comfortable sneaker for wide feet. I am on my feet all day for work and my feet don't hurt at the end of the day. I plan on getting another pair.
Like walking barefoot …
I used the shoe for long 5 miles walk.Extremely comfortable. Strongly recommend it

Super flexible shoe, great for walking I’ve noticed my calf’s getting stronger as well and super grippy at the bottom which I love.

I absolutely love them

评论概述: Shoes wore out in a month and no company contact
评论详情: Within about a month the inner lining above the big toe tore in the left shoe. Within a short time after, less than 2 months the inner lining tore in the same place in the right shoe and the outer material is separating from the sole. I'm not a big Amazon shopper and life is too busy for me to come back to the computer to check to see when I ordered something to see if it is still within the window to return, so of course I've missed that. I would say I've worn these with average wear. I do a fair amount of walking, but I'm not hiking mountains or anything like that. This is super disappointing because these shoes were very comfortable, even as my first pair of "barefoot" shoes and I felt I was walking better, more upright. Its also quite disappointing that if you go to the company's website, there is no way to contact them. I will be checking for that before making future online purchases and I will not be making additional purchases or recommending WHITIN. I had originally planned to try them myself and then purchase for my husband and son if they worked out. Its only because I'm not a huge online shopper that kept me from getting online and already making additional purchases since they were so comfortable, so this company will lose out. It looks like enough people like them, or submitted a review before the shoes broke/tore, that they probably won't miss my contribution to their profits though.  The pictures are of the same tear, one zoomed out so you can see where on the shoe it is, the other zoomed in. I can't get pictures of the inside tears since its in the toe box, but I can feel them with every step. As you can see, minus some dust, they otherwise look to be in good condition, indicating I'm not exposing them in outrageous conditions.

Less than 2 months of wearing these 2 times a week to work out and a hole is already forming in the material near the toes. They are cheaply made. The material is very thin. The tongue of the shoe is also crooked on your feet and there is no way to adjust it. Just very poorly made.
Maybe the ugliest pair of shoes I’ve ever purchased but who cares what they look like when they feel this good!  Perhaps green is not my color.

Initial thoughts : It’s a nice shoe for the price, I normally wear an 8 in women’s, so I ordered an 8 and it fits perfectly. Has a nice cushion area in the heel for the Achilles which was a nice surprise, the only thing I wasn’t a fan of was the bottom rubber foot piece is like a bright orange versus a more neutral color. But once the shoes gets used, it should darken up a bit. I also tried it on with no socks and I didn’t like the feel of it, felt like it would rub on some spots of my foot causing discomfort. Overall good buy.
Very comfortable, love the color. The structure of the shoes is not tight but acts almost like a shroud on the foot. The shoes conform to the foot and are pliable.

Most comfortable shoes I own and don’t get ‘ I can’t wait to take them off’ feeling. I have wide feet and usual hiking shoes were hurting my toes after wearing them for over an hour, specially going down, hutting the toes, and squeezing. These shoes have been very wide and not squeezing my toes, and was much better quality than I expected.

评论概述: Solved my foot pain issue- Love this shoe
评论详情: This is the 2nd set I've ordered. First pair I wore for 3 years and the top looked brand new, only had to get a new pair cause I wore through the soles. These shoes fixed my Plantar fasciitis because the soles let me flex my foot completely when walking. I have another pair saved in my cart for the next time I need a set. Love them!
These shoes are so comfortable and stylish. The fit is perfect. Well worth what I paid. Gonna order  in another color. Great  value!
I love this shoe fits perfect size 8, I had it on hole day and it felt great, skid free, it has a arch wich makes it very comfortable. It is not for a very wide foot. Will buy one more

评论概述: Best shoes I have ever owned!
评论详情: So, I turned 50, four years ago. I have always had horrible feet, my second toe is longer then my first. All my toes curve towards the pinky toe which makes me have large bunions under my big toe. About 15 years ago I developed a fungus under my toe nails that I have been dealing with. I got to talking to a nurse and it was brought to my attention that if ur body is fighting an infection eventually it gets worn down which can cause a lot of other problems eventually lead to heart disease and death because it fights continually to fight infection. I have no health insurance so I've been cutting my toe nails very, very short and putting bleach directly on them, it has always been painful for me to walk but, excruciating getting older, my feet have gotten wider and wrking on concrete floors all my life then trying to get rid of this nail fungus. So to end this review I just want to say the shoes run true to size, they fit perfect and to be honest I feel like I'm almost barefoot. My entire body feels better, my back, my legs, my sciatica . These shoes are simply life changing, I have been impressed as I have gone thru hundreds of dollars trying to find a damn comfortable shoe. I am just so grateful, these are AMAZING!! If ur considering these shoes, look no further I'm telling u u will not regret ur decision.......
The minute I put these on, I loved them! So comfortable! Lightweight and flexible with a grounded feeling.

I have short wide feet. It is very hard to find a shoe that fits my feet due to most toe boxes being on the smaller end. These fit great! I am not expecting these to be a long wear shoe, just casual. It does have a high arch but they are very comfortable with a cushioned heel to reduce rubbing. Very happy with the purchase.

It has a very different feel than regular shoes.  I got used to them very quickly. Wide toe box.  Stretchy and durable material.  Non-skid sole with good traction; not slippery. I was able to work in them 12hours as a hospital nurse.  Quick slip on and off. No issues with rubbing and forming blisters. Great value for the price and I would definitely buy again.
I wore the shoes 3 days straight, on that 3rd day i got spasms in my thighs. Haven’t and wont put them back on

I bought these for lifting at the recommendation of my trainer. They've been great as intended. However, I also walk daily and I was having tremendous shin pain. I tried every sneaker in my closet but nothing made it better. Finally, I decided to try these even though I had never worn them off the gym floor. Finally! My shin pain is gone.
I wear these all the time. My favorite go to casual shoe. I’ve even been on a few advanced hikes and they did well.

I like this shoe a lot. Roomy toe box. Zero drop. Light weight. Easy laces. Just enough stretch. All of that and it looks good too. It’s my new favorite. I just did five miles and while I could definitely feel the trail, I didn’t have any pain through the soles. I’m glad I found these

Giving these a 3 star. The toe box is definitely wide enough for my wide feet, the 5.5-6 is a perfect length, and the feeling is almost like being barefoot. However, the top of my feet hurt because of not enough room top to bottom, and I loosened everything as much as I could, straps and Velcro both. Very disappointed. I am sure they will work out great for most folks, but not for me.

Brand new vs nearly 1600 miles in a year. I’m pretty impressed with my first pair of barefoot shoes since I rarely get a year out of a single pair of shoes. Knowing that I wore them and walked/ran/mowed a distance equal to twice the width of Texas plus 49.27 miles or twice the length of Texas minus 6.73 miles puts it into perspective. They held up phenomenally well. I originally ordered them with the intention of upgrading to a higher quality barefoot shoe (like Xero) when/if they fell apart a month later. They were supposed to be my test shoe to see if barefoot shoes improved my foot pain. Here I am, a year later, replacing them with the exact same shoes. I’ve been humbled and feel the need to lay them to rest respectfully rather than unceremoniously tossing them in the bin. Here’s to the next 1600 miles, or maybe 2000 (I’m feeling adventurous).
Tight Around ankles and I don’t like sides include hard plasticy tie areas
